name: BR Logic Pack
description: Game bundle with 6 classic logical / puzzle games. Something for those who like pipes, tiles, math games, falling blocks, and challenges. Ambient games, without tons of distractions. Focused on random levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
